Configuration.Name: L1=20m_L2=1p3m_offset_new
Configuration.SetupScript:
config.wavelength = 5 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 config.det = 510 config.det_offset = 300 config.srce = 180 config.guide = 'ga' config.apx = -72 config.bs = 1 config.beamcenterx = 91.43 config.beamcenterz = 94.70
config.drive()
